function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission of COVID-19 through the air and contaminated surfaces","Impact":"Potential for widespread infection and rapid spread of the virus","Mitigation":"Use of face masks, hand hygiene, and surface disinfection; promotion of ventilation and air purification in indoor spaces","Technologies":"Air purifiers, UV-C disinfection systems, ventilation systems","People":"General public, individuals in crowded spaces or indoor environments","Owner":"Health authorities, building managers, individuals"}]}
